page.title: 01EVENTS Carnivals
page.content: Burton Carnival Day 27th May 1985 {Floats: A Gypsy Caravan _ St James's Drive An overgrown garden _ Vicarage Close An operating theatre _ Mowbray Drive Noddy in Toyland _ Burton playgroup Alice in Wonderland _ Station Lane Bugsy Malone _ Burton Park Peter Pan _ Main Street Rose Queen and attendants The winner was the overgrown garden by Vicarage Close. { A float is a lorry or a trailer {decorated with a theme. Refreshments and Stalls: White Elephant stall (Odds and ends.) Clothes stall Sweets and Drinks stall Barbecue (a fire to cook meat.) A pie and cake stall An ice cream stall A fruit stall
